articles.title: Microsoft Teams will get Zoom's killer feature and show 49 meeting participants on screen - OnMSFT
articles.description: If Microsoft recently updated Teams and Skype to make them display up to 9 thumbnails during video calls, Microsoft Teams will soon match Zoom’s ability to show up to 49 participants at a time.
